ja423:5.4: jīvantova visussati → jīvantopi visussati (sya1ed, sya2ed) | jīvareva visussati (pts-vp-pli1ed) | jīvanto vāpi sussati (mr)
ja423:6.3: Sosi → sopi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr), sukhā → sukha (sya1ed, sya2ed) | sukhaṃ (mr)
ja423:9.1: gahapatī → gahapatiṃ (bj) | gahapataṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | gahavataṃ (?)
ja423:10.2: api so → asito (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed), devilo → devalo (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
